name: Coughers DEMO
description: Coughers DEMO - Copyright ©2020 Jerome Lebel - v1.1.1 short FPS demo made with Unreal Engine 4 Story: A demonic invasion in your city brought in a deadly virus. Possessed citizens (who willingly collaborated with evil) and demons are trying to infect you and everybody else. As a decorated soldier, you have to fight back against these assholes! --- All assets (sprites, textures, images, music, sounds (except for assault rifle sound (taken from YouTube)), story, writing, digitized voice), game design, blueprint scripts by Jerome Lebel
